text: Lương Cường (born 15 August 1957) is a Vietnamese politician and general. He has been the 14th president of Vietnam since 2024. He succeeded Tô Lâm. He was elected by the Vietnamese parliament and was appointed as president of Vietnam in October 21, 2024. He is elected as president after a corruption crackdown in the country. In his appointment as president, he promised to make the country's defence and security strong. ==Life== He was born in Phu Tho province in 1957. He also became a Politburo member in 2021 and served for the Vietnamese army for four decades. ==References== Category:Presidents of Vietnam Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Vietnamese generals Category:Current national leaders
title: Lương Cường
